pasugiyada athiwu darunu suli kunatuwa hethuwen miyagiya dhiwarayanta, winasha wu dhiwara yathrawalata wandi gewima sandaha rupiyal miliyana 73.2k rajaya mangin wenkara atha.me sambandhayen dhiwara ha jalaja sampath sanwardhana amathi waidya rajitha senarathna mahatha idiripath kala amathya mandala sandeshayata anumathiya himiwi thibe.winasha wu dhiwara yathra saha aampanna aluthin labadimath, ardhahani wu yathrawalata 50% aadhara mudalak labadimath memangin sidu kerenu atha.dhiwarayange ananyathawaya, yathrawala wisthara athulu daththa siyalla labunu wahama eki wandi mudal kadinamin pirinamana bawa dhiwara ha jalaja sampath sanwardhana amathi waidya rajitha senarathna mahatha pawasayi.mema suli sulanga nisa dhiwarayan 51 miyagos, dhiwarayan 08k athurudanwa athi athara dhiwara yathra 84k sampurnayenma winasha wi atha.
